markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Shield 0"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Dart Shield](/Shields.aspx?ID=6)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Launching Dart" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=483" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 20 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

<row gap="medium">
**Price** 8 gp

**AC Bonus** 1 

**Speed Penalty** —
</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Bulk** 1

**Hardness** 3

**HP (BT)** 12 (6)
</row>

</column>

---

This wooden shield features a spring-loaded device on its surface that can fire darts with powerful force. A small mechanism within the shield allows you to fire a dart even while actively holding the shield or blocking with it.
name: Dart Shield
